Html:
Hi,

This looks just awesome and I am convinced to give it a try.

But since documentation is not ready yet, how can I "get started"?

I want to start some very basic stuff like navigating to a particular lat/long, adding marker, map zooming / panning etc.

BTW, I want to use this control in a windows application (C#.NET)

Regards.
just download the source, there are few demos that do basic stuff
